title: Beyond Time, Living in Sengoku - Novel Updates
author: Fujiwara Ami   藤原あみ
description:
Sakurai Aoi slips back in time to the Sengoku period during her last year of high school.

Oda Nobunaga is gradually drawn to Aoi, even though he’s puzzled by her existence.

It’s the story of the ephemeral and intense life of two people, depicted through the life of Oda Nobunaga.>
